name: Doggy: Human to Dog Translator
description:
Doggy is the most fun way to interact with your dog!

SPEAK
Doggy opens right to the translation, so you can record your speech and translate it to dog speech.
• Play with your pet every single minute of your life and you both will be happy!
• Draw your dog’s attention with Doggy and make it easy to learn dog behavior.

CHAT
• Choose from a curated list of dog emojis and talk to your dog like it is a person!
• Let your dog know what you feel and understand your language.
• Now you and your dog can be on the same wavelength!

Note: The app is created for dog lovers and for entertainment purposes only.

Terms of Use: https://sites.google.com/view/doggy-terms
Privacy Policy: https://sites.google.com/view/doggy-privacy-policy
